title: Moderna Says Covid-19 Vaccine Contaminant in Japan Was Stainless Steel, Sees No Safety Issue
author: Miho Inada
description: The foreign substance detected in some vials of Moderna's Covid-19 vaccine in Japan was stainless steel and it isn't believed to affect the vaccine's safety or efficacy, Moderna and its Japanese partner said.
cleaned_text: Sept. 2, 2021 11:24 am ET TOKYO—The foreign substance detected in some vials of Moderna Inc.'s Covid-19 vaccine in Japan was stainless steel and it isn't believed to affect the vaccine's safety or efficacy, Moderna and its Japanese partner said.
